price: Luego, a pesar de las pruebas de su inocencia, optaron por encarcelarlo temporalmente [para evitar los rumores].
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
